add_mlir_dialect_library(MLIRSCFTransformOps
  SCFTransformOps.cpp

  ADDITIONAL_HEADER_DIRS
  ${MLIR_MAIN_INCLUDE_DIR}/mlir/Dialect/SCF/TransformOps

  DEPENDS
  MLIRSCFTransformOpsIncGen

  LINK_LIBS PUBLIC
  MLIRAffineDialect
  MLIRFuncDialect
  MLIRIR
  MLIRPDLDialect
  MLIRSCFDialect
  MLIRSCFTransforms
  MLIRSCFUtils
  MLIRTransformDialect
  MLIRVectorDialect
)
